entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening and ending after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thundershowers in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016
